localize.text: "How big do you want to be?"
"Stab the Prince's heart. Only then can you live."
"The witch gave her human legs, for the price of taking her beautiful voice. She cut off her tongue."
“Your Highness! We've committed an unforgiveable deed! Please, spare u..."
"A single drop of blood is enough to spend the night in a rampage."
Take RED damage every attack Heal 40% of damage dealt as HP
"And the thirst would never truly be quenched."
Convert some health regained by Thirst into a shield
"Lower my hair, so I can escape from this hell."
